title: Shakira Sets 2025 Stadium Tour: How to Get Tickets
description: Following immense demand, the pop star reworked her upcoming tour to play larger arenas and stadiums throughout 2025. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here. Shakira Sets 2025 Stadium Tour: How to Get Tickets Mary Siroky
author: Mary Siroky
excerpt: Shakira has announced an upgraded version of her2025 tour, featuring North American stadium shows. Learn how to get pre-sale tickets here.
text: Shakira has unveiled upgraded dates for her 2025 North American “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour.” Get Shakira Tickets Here After an enormous wave of demand, the Latin music superstar shifted her previously announced 2024 trek to next year, during which she’ll be taking on larger arenas and stadiums. The tour will mainly focus on Shakira’s 2024 album, Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran. Secure your seat here, and learn how to get tickets below, including details on pre-sale codes and other on-sale information. What Is Shakira’s 2025 World Tour? Known for her high-energy live performances, Shakira has upped the ante for her 2025 trek. The recently revamped US dates will now kick off on May 13th, 2025, in Charlotte, North Carolina, a show that will be followed by a massive night at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey. Later, Shakira is set to make stops in Toronto, Boston, Miami, Las Vegas, and more cities before wrapping up in San Francisco in June. This US leg will follow a series of stops throughout South America and Mexico, where all the stadium shows sold out in under two hours. While the tour is centered on Shakira’s 2024 LP, Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran, a statement about the tour promises time for the “iconic hits” from throughout her catalogue. Who Is Opening for Sharkia on the “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour?” There is no word yet on openers Shakira might be bringing along for the North American shows. Supporting acts on previous tours have included Colombian band Bomba Estéreo and Panama-based duo Gaitanes. How Can I Get Tickets to Shakira’s 2025 Tour? Tickets for the “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” will become available through a number of advanced ticket pre-sales, including a Live Nation pre-sale on Thursday, October 24th at 2:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster (use code TEMPO), as well as a Wolfpack fan club pre-sale on Thursday, October 24th at 12:00 p.m. local time that fans can register for via Shakira’s website. A Citi Cardmember pre-sale is set for Wednesday, October 23rd. Tickets for Shakria’s 2025 tour will then go on sale to the general public beginning Friday, October 25th at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster. Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand. What Are Shakira’s Tour Dates? See Shakira’s full list of dates below, and grab tickets here. Shakira 2025 North American Tour Dates: 05/13 – Charlotte, NC @ Bank of America Stadium 05/15 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium 05/20 – Montreal, QC @ Bell Centre 05/22 – Detroit, MI @ Little html:
Shakira has unveiled upgraded dates for her 2025 North American “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour.”

Get Shakira Tickets Here

After an enormous wave of demand, the Latin music superstar shifted her previously announced 2024 trek to next year, during which she’ll be taking on larger arenas and stadiums. The tour will mainly focus on Shakira’s 2024 album, Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran.

Secure your seat here, and learn how to get tickets below, including details on pre-sale codes and other on-sale information.

What Is Shakira’s 2025 World Tour?

Known for her high-energy live performances, Shakira has upped the ante for her 2025 trek. The recently revamped US dates will now kick off on May 13th, 2025, in Charlotte, North Carolina, a show that will be followed by a massive night at MetLife Stadium in East Rutherford, New Jersey. Later, Shakira is set to make stops in Toronto, Boston, Miami, Las Vegas, and more cities before wrapping up in San Francisco in June.

This US leg will follow a series of stops throughout South America and Mexico, where all the stadium shows sold out in under two hours.

While the tour is centered on Shakira’s 2024 LP, Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran, a statement about the tour promises time for the “iconic hits” from throughout her catalogue.

Who Is Opening for Sharkia on the “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour?”

There is no word yet on openers Shakira might be bringing along for the North American shows. Supporting acts on previous tours have included Colombian band Bomba Estéreo and Panama-based duo Gaitanes.

How Can I Get Tickets to Shakira’s 2025 Tour?

Tickets for the “Las Mujeres Ya No Lloran World Tour” will become available through a number of advanced ticket pre-sales, including a Live Nation pre-sale on Thursday, October 24th at 2:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster (use code TEMPO), as well as a Wolfpack fan club pre-sale on Thursday, October 24th at 12:00 p.m. local time that fans can register for via Shakira’s website. A Citi Cardmember pre-sale is set for Wednesday, October 23rd.

Tickets for Shakria’s 2025 tour will then go on sale to the general public beginning Friday, October 25th at 12:00 p.m. local time via Ticketmaster.

Once tickets are on sale, fans can look for deals or get tickets to sold-out shows via StubHub, where orders are 100% guaranteed through StubHub’s FanProtect program. StubHub is a secondary market ticketing platform, and prices may be higher or lower than face value, depending on demand.

What Are Shakira’s Tour Dates?

See Shakira’s full list of dates below, and grab tickets here.

Shakira 2025 North American Tour Dates:

05/15 – East Rutherford, NJ @ MetLife Stadium
